name: DATEV
description: Accounting software for tax consultants and SMEs, specializing in German financial compliance.
longDescription: DATEV, founded in 1966 in Nuremberg, Germany, is a trusted provider of accounting and tax software, primarily serving tax consultants, accountants, and SMEs in Germany. With a focus on compliance with German financial regulations, DATEV offers tools for bookkeeping, payroll, and tax management, supporting over 2.5 million users with reliable, secure solutions.
